issue.title: [Rust] json reader should validate value type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10876](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10876). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
json reader should error out if row type is not object

comments.body:
